reviews.review_msg: There is nothing bad to say about this prof. He gives great information passionatly, his assignments are fair, and I would definetly take him again
I really interesting prof who gives fair exams. A great introduction to international politics, a bit repetitive for international studies students but a good overview anyway.
I really interesting prof who gives fair exams. A great introduction to international politics, a bit repetitive for international studies students but a good overview anyway.
I really interesting prof who gives fair exams. A great introduction to international politics, a bit repetitive for international studies students but a good overview anyway.

Great professor, very interested in International Politics. He has good lecture notes, and even though he might have an accent, he explains his thoughts in a clear manner. Very approachable. Highly recommended!
completely agree...the notes are long and he totally tests you on things you wouldn't even think could appear on an exam just because they're that minute and ridiculous...but he's a nice guy
He's a nice guy but unless you like taking about a 1000 pages worth of notes and being tested on micro details, this is not the guy for you

Dr. Ramjee Parajulee was an excellent professor that manages to promote critical thinking skills among his students. He will help any students that is in need of any help. However, the textbook Sens and Stoett's Global Politics: Origins, Currents ad Directions is too boring and long to read. Avoid it.
